name: Neander-Brawl
description:
Two cavemen are in disagreement. Help them settle their dispute.

Assume the role of a caveman wielding a club and defeat the opposing caveman, also wielding a club.

  • Play single-player against the computer or fight against a friend
  • Battle across 4 stages
  • Try the optional 'Fast Mode' for a greater challenge

Created during the Godot Wild Jam #42 under the theme, "Ancient."
